description.zh: Plausible Analytics 是一个轻量级、开源且注重隐私的 Google Analytics 替代方案。它提供简洁的网页分析功能，不使用 Cookie，完全符合 GDPR、CCPA 和 PECR 规范。用户可以选择自建社区版或使用基于云的托管服务。
description.en: Plausible Analytics is a lightweight, open-source, and privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics. It offers simple web analytics without cookies, fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and PECR. Users can either self-host the community edition or use the cloud-based managed service.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 注重隐私，不收集个人数据和不使用 Cookie
- 脚本轻量，提升网站加载速度
- 内建符合 GDPR、CCPA 和 PECR 的合规性
- 提供自建和云托管两种部署方式的开源项目
- 独立运营，通过订阅盈利，避免监控型商业模式

## 功能列表:

- 简洁的单页仪表板，展示所有关键数据
- 支持邮件和 Slack 的定期报告及流量提醒
- 可邀请团队成员并分配角色权限
- 支持公开或私密仪表板分享
- 自定义事件跟踪及维度分析，支持转化目标
- 电商收入跟踪、文件下载和 404 页面监控
- 漏斗分析功能优化转化率
- 集成 Google Search Console 获取搜索关键词
- 支持基于 pushState 和哈希的单页应用（SPA）
- 支持从 Google Analytics 平滑迁移并导入历史数据
- 支持 CSV 导出、统计 API 和 Looker Studio 集成
- 社区版支持通过 ClickHouse 访问原始数据
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Privacy-focused with no personal data or cookie tracking
- Lightweight script for fast website loading
- GDPR/CCPA/PECR compliant by design
- Open source with both self-hosted and managed cloud options
- Independent and subscription-funded, avoiding surveillance-based business models

## Features:

- Clutter-free dashboard with all insights on one page
- Email and Slack reporting with traffic alerts
- Team member invitations and role assignments
- Public or private dashboard sharing options
- Custom event tracking with dimensions and conversion goals
- Ecommerce revenue tracking, file downloads, and 404 monitoring
- Funnel analysis for conversion optimization
- Search keyword integration with Google Search Console
- Support for SPAs using pushState or hash-based routing
- Easy transition from Google Analytics with import capabilities
- CSV export, stats API, and Looker Studio integration
- Self-hosted access to raw data via ClickHouse (Community Edition)
